Dialogue.Value: Alice，just because you added,a Humor AddOn doesn’t mean,that I’ll say something funny.
In the first place，everybody’s,sense of humor is different，,and--
What you’re saying is，you,couldn’t think of anything?
All you have to do is....,Uh....
....Why am I getting so mad,about this?
Welcome，everyone，to Miss,Shanghai’s Advice Corner!,Rejoice，you lost little lambs!
”Advice Corner”?,Oh no....
Today’s guest is the Golden,Goddess，Alice Shinki!
Didn’t you say you’d stop,using that nickname?!
Don’t worry，nobody would,ever disagree with that,name!
That’s not what I meant!!
Heeeeeeey! Impressions time!,Let’s start!
Today’s theme is -- Rika!,Go!
That all you had?!
Once upon a time，there was,an old man and an old lady.
One day they were visited by,an old friend，with shocking,news!
The old man and old lady,were fictional characters，,delusions of our weak minds!
What a twist!
Hey Alice，nice weather today，,huh?
Hehehe....It’s me....,I found a lead on where that,guy was hidin’ his stash...
Idiot! Don’t call me in front,of Alice!
Haha!,Wrong numbers，huh?
(Even if she tries to hide it，,that’s how Shanghai is，huh....)
Hey Shanghai，I want to ask,you something--
Oh! Alice! What is it?
....What did you do now?
Haha! That’s a good joke!,Enough about that，what did,you need?
Heeeeeeey! Impressions time!,Let’s start!
Today’s theme is --,SpannerMan!,Go!
Oh no! I’ve been defeated!,Kerchunk!
I’ll get you next time!,Clang!
Haha! That’s perfect!
Shanghai can be so mean,sometimes....
What?! Where’d you come,from?!
If I were a magical girl....
A magical girl?
Magical Shanghai! Dress Up!
The bad guy’s going to turn,you into a hamburger with,a magical butcher machine!
I’ll turn them into hamburger!
Now that I think about it，you’re,in amazing shape，Alice.
Every time we jack in，you,make a meter-high vertical,jump!
Then Tenshi had to go to the,hospital for burns，when you,got out without a scratch!
And that was after light,frostbite from operating in front,of a runaway refridgerator!
Boss Alice!,This one apologizes for her,impertinence!
It’s a new hairstyle!
Wow!,It’s like you’ve got rabbit’s ears!
Like a bowl of noodles got,dumped over my face!
Is someone mocking me?
Rabbit’s ear....,Noodles....,Snkrrt.
Shanghai’s Consultation room，,we’ve got a guest caller!
Hi，this is Mari Morichika.
What can we do for you?
I feel like I’m a forgettable,side-character.
My dad is the doctor，but I feel,that’s my only distinguishing,trait.
Rika’s got her personality and,Remilia’s rich，but I’ve got,nothing.
What about becoming rich，or,becoming more distinctive?
I don’t think you can just,get rich，so I guess you’ll,have to be distinctive.
How’s this?,It’s a-me，Mari!
....No.,Alice，we should go.
Oh no....
What’s the situation?!
They’ve broken through the,first line of defense!
What are our fighters doing?!
Their power level is beyond,our comprehension!
I’m getting out of here!
What’s going on?
She’s caught me! The beast,has broken through! Is this the,end of our brave defenders?
-- dismissed!
How many people do you,have working for you，anyhow?
There’s ten executives，each,with 20 guys and a vice-exec，,and each of those guys have....
....A lot!
So I was headed to the shop，,and wanted to buy a Resist.
But all the shopkeepers were,on strike! The landlord for their,stalls wanted more money!
But I didn’t find out until I’d,already gone up to buy my,items!
It was a random rent-related,retail Resist register refusal!
Mhm.... How crazy!,....Sorry，were you saying,somthing?
You know the virus that looks,like a monkey?
Wukong，right?
I heard that they know,techniques of ancient martial,artists.
There’s the legendary strike,that looks harmless but causes,the victim to keel over later.
The last time I fought one，I,thought I felt it tap me，and now,I’m feeling.... feeling.... Argh!
You’re heartless，Alice....
So I was hanging out at the,market the other day and,something weird happened!
When a pack of SworDog,showed up and started raiding,the hotdog stand!
A bunch of us called it the,SworDog Hotdog incident!
It really happened!
Sure it did.
Mmmmm.,Alice，I just can’t fall asleep.
I heard counting Kedama helps.
....one BugFrag....,....three BugFrags....
That confident，are you?
Shanghai’s Consultation room，,we’ve got a guest caller!
Mukyu! It’s me!
What’s bothering you today?
I’m frustrated!,I’m a NetNavi，but I can’t fight,any NetBattles!
Have you heard of this great,new product? Introducing the,Incredible Muscle Suit!
What happens when you put on,the suit? Tell me about it，Mary!
Well Bob，this amazing suit,instantly adds a layer of hard,muscle! But an attractive level!
That’s unreal! It must cost an,absolute fortune!
That’s just it，Bob! You can,get this marvel for an affordable,18000 Zenny!
What a bargain! That’s a,no-brainer，folks! Call now!
(....but where do I call?)
Sometimes people tell me,that I’m not a proper NetNavi.
I’ll try to behave and be a,serious NetNavi for you!
(Could it be....?)
Miss Alice!,You have mail!
Miss Alice!,Nice operating!
Miss Alice!,If anything’s bothering you,please feel free to talk to me!
This is weird....,Stop....
◄(Was actually being serious)
Oh no! I’m turning into Sakuya!
What’s wrong with being like,Sakuya?!
Her hair’s as white as a,grandma’s!
Oh no!
Did you get a white hair?
Call the cyber-stylist!
It’s silver!
What?! Where’d you come,from?!
Heeeeeeey! Name game!
Today’s theme is -- Remilia!,Go!
”Re”!
A drop of golden sun!
”Mi”!
A name I call myself!
”Li”!
I don’t think that’s in the song!
”A” for Alice! Alice’s face!
Hey! What about my face?!
What are you talking about?
What’s that word?,When something smells bad?,Shinki?
Hey Shanghai，I don’t think I’ve,seen you without your ribbon on.
Really?,Take a good look，it’s,annoying to take off.
Aaand done!
Is that a picture of me?
I didn’t want to tell you like,this，Alice....,You’ve been dead for 6 years.
That was the picture we showed,at your funeral.
Just kidding!
Shanghai’s Consultation room，,we’ve got a guest caller!
It’s Tsubaki Nekku.
Lost little lamb，tell me your,trouble.
I’m surrounded by pretty girls,but nobody notices me!
How do I set some flags?,What am I doing wrong?
This guy....
THE SPRITE GOD HEARS,THE CRY OF A LOST SOUL!,WHAT IS YOUR WISH?
Is that you，God?!,I want a girlfriend! Let me go out,with one of my classmates!
EVEN I DO NOT HAVE THAT,POWER!
(I wonder what my wish,would be....?)
Oh! Here’s a letter I found in,your old time capsule! It’s a,letter from a younger you!
Well? What does it say?
Well，uh....
Dear Future Alice，,I hope you did what I wanted!
What I want most in my life is....
I wanna be the string，that,you pull to turn on a lamp!
The string?!
Well? Did you do it?
....I walked by a really smelly,midget yesterday.
That came out of nowhere!
In a scene in a movie where,the heroine walks off into the,sunset，what’s a good line?
She turns around，looks at,the side character，and says:
Probably something like:,”Don’t forget me” or something.
I think it’d be more like:
”Kill all humans!”
Didn’t you say heroine?
Hey Alice，I’ve got a good,nickname for Reisen.
What is it?
That weird white hair she has, looks like noodles，right?
So ”Udon Hair” fits someone, with hair that looks like udon.
#s@phone#Briiiiing！
You’re mocking me，aren’t,you?
N-no!,What would make you think,that? We wouldn’t do that!
#s@phone#Briiiiing！
Heeeeeeey! Name game!
Today’s theme is -- Kedama!,Go!
”Ke”!
What am I supposed to,say here?
”Da”!
I’ve still got nothing!
”Ma”!
Does ”Mama” count?
That’s not in ”Kedama”!
(Must’ve used Japanese!,....but arent I speaking,Japanese?)
Are you eating something，,Shanghai?
I foun’ a Gehpa’!
A GelPack? You’re eating a,virus?
Ish’ goo’!,....Mmph!,Better than a restaurant!
....,....Oooh.,My stomach....
Ahhh!,It’s bad!,I’m never eating a virus again!
(You say that now，but I know,you’re going to...)
Shanghai’s Consultation room，,we’ve got a guest caller!
Thank you very much.
Beleaguered soul，what ails,you?
Miss Reisen，she.... Every,situation is solved with force....,Is that all I’m good for?
If it helps，I think Reisen,might be stronger than you.
Don’t worry! You’re still strong!,I’m sure things will work out!
Learn a trick or two and I’m,sure you can find another role!
A trick....
....like firing a sword from my,nose?
....how did you end up with that,idea?
A sword from my nose!,Two swords from my nose!
I think she’s broken!
Oh no!
What’s that one kid’s book?,Some girl follows a rabbit?
Oh! That one!,....I’ve forgotten the name.
Wonderland? No....,Someone in Wonderland?,A-something in Wonderland?
Ar....，Al....,....Aristotle?
The philosopher?!
Heeeeeeey! Impressions time!,Let’s start!
Today’s theme is -- Alice’s,grandma!,Go!
Ooh，Alice!,You’ve grown so big!
Been eating a lot of sweets，,I see!
Oh sweetie，I was just asking,if you wanted some candy!
You can do impressions by,yourself if you want.
You two look like you’re,having fun!
The words are right，but....
It’s because my voice is still,young and beautiful!
I’m planning dinner，do you,want eggs and rice?
You have to wake up!
You have to wake up!,This is all a dream!
No!,I’m not going back!
Shanghai’s Consultation room，,we’ve got a guest caller!
Hi，this is Wriggle!
Little lamb，what troubles you?
My father is the king，and I,have an older sister and,younger brother.
Sometimes I worry that I’m not,good enough....
My sister is popular and,gentle，and my brother is,smart and serious，and my--
You just keep going and going!
What?! You’re terrible!
You’re terrible!,Don’t dump your royal family,troubles on me!
Has anyone even said anything,to you，or is all this in your,head?!
....You’re right!,Thank you，Shanghai!
....Great way to talk to the,royal princess，Shanghai.
What is a princess to a,goddess?
Tell Mari I’m in the ground.
Mari -- ground，,Merry -- go-round.,Get it?
Did that make you laugh?!
Take him away.
Please，mercy!,Not the toilets!
Shut it!,On your feet!
....What’s this about toilets?,Why was he so scared?
My，uh，”hangout” has a lot of,toilets.
By the time you get to the,last，someone’s already used,one that just got cleaned.
An eternal circuit of toilets....,A toilet Ouroboros，if you will.
What’re the names of your,teacher and the chip-shop,owner，again?
Ms. Kumako and Kumami，,why?
They’ve gotta be sisters....,But who’s the younger and,who’s the older?
Hmm? Are you guys talking,about me?
Ah!,Look，a distraction!
Wriggle....Remilia....Tenshi....,You’ve got a thing for,damsels in distress，huh?
What?! They’re all my precious,friends! Friends!
I’m going to find a good,boyfriend! You’ll see!
But your ”friends” are going,to be so disappointed!
It’s going to be alright，don’t,worry.
(Where’d she come from?!)
Is there anything you can’t,deal with，Shanghai?
Well，I can’t swim.,I’m a Navi，there’s no water.
....Besides that?
My deepest secret....,When I smell a good steak，I,just can’t control myself!
You’re such a glutton，,Shanghai.
Shanghai， no!,We’re not going to prank call,Doctor Yagokoro!
